General.Name: Cyxtera Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Cyxtera Technologies, Inc. provides various data center products and services for enterprises, service providers, and government agencies. It offers retail colocation, interconnection, deployment, and support services; Bare Metal, an on-demand IT infrastructure solution; and Cyxtera SmartCabs, an on-demand colocation cabinets. The company is headquartered in Coral Gables, Florida. On June 4, 2023, Cyxtera Technologies, Inc., along with its affiliates, filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware.
